The Special Prosecutor's Office has been transferred to the Agency for Investigation and Management of Assets (ARMA) by almost $ 1 million in the former VLK chairman in the Chernihiv region.

About thisreportedOffice of the Prosecutor General.

At the request of the prosecutors of the Chernihiv Specialized Prosecutor's Office in the field of defense of the Central Region, the Court made an arrest and transferred money to the ARMA in the amount of $ 963.6 thousand and 22.5 thousand euros,which were seized during searchesThe former head of the VLK at the Chernihiv Regional Shopping Center and SP.

As previously reported, the official received an undue benefit from the military for recognition of them unfit for military service during mobilization. In this way, he contributed to the residents of Chernihiv in evasion.

Procedural actions were carried out within the framework of criminal proceedings on the facts of obtaining undue benefit, obstruction of the legitimate activity of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations, as well as the illegal transfer of persons across the state border of Ukraine (Part 5 of Article 27 of Part 3 of Article 368, Part 1 114-1, Part 3 of Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).

The suspect is currently in custody.
